Text:
These files/grabs are new ones?
Sounds good.

If you're interested, there are more :)

- EKV unplugged in Pristina
- EKV live Novi Rock, 1984
- EKV live 1991
- English recordings (3 songs)
+ Tribute to EKV, Live in Kulusic, 2002/3 (Massimo, Gile, Darko Rundek...)

BTW, Angel's Breath is not Milan's solo album: it was made with Suba/Rex Ilusivii and other friends...

Greetings!

Thank you. I miss the kulusic tribute and novi rock live ones but have the rest. Feel free to put them on if you can. I would love that. The reasson I didnt put on more was I tried to make the seed as small as possible still giving the essentials. I will put more live and bootlegs albums later. 

If they happen to read I do apologize to Suba/Rex Ilusivii and everyone else involved in Angel Breath album. I know its actually more a group of friends got together made a record than a tru solo record by Milan. I used the word solo album mostly because thats how its called by word of mouth so to say. Its really a unusual and great album and I wish they made more.

I would like to share it with others - but haven't idea how to "create a torrent"... although I beleive i can found it via Net.... If there's something like 5-steps "How to", I'll be thankful!
:)

Here is a usefully guide on how to create a torrent. 

http://www.wikihow.com/Create-a-Torrent

The tracker can be found if you use upload torrent link at the bottom of this page here or any pirate bay pages.

Ok. I've done it.
It should be listed here soon, I hope.

Hey. Hvala puno. Razveliosi nas sviju chak i malu iz Liverpula. Kazhe da je Milan imao veoma sexi glas. We missed them very much. 
Hvala puno za slike i covers and A Grreat collection.
Pozdravi iz Londona od Viki, Dariane i Igora. 2008
ovo sam trazio jako, jako dugo. Hvala!
